definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: I need to get a new email account.
sentences.chinese: 我需要申請一個新的電子信箱。

sentences.english: A quotation mark is not acceptable in an email address.
sentences.chinese: 在電子信箱位址上，引號不被允許的。

sentences.english: So, I wonder whether you could let me know your email or not.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果可以的話，請告訴我，您的電子信箱。

sentences.english: Then he started opening his email.
The files will then be sent to you by email in PDF format.
sentences.chinese: 相關文件將以PDF格式發送到您的電子信箱中。

sentences.english: I want to check my E-mail.
sentences.chinese: 我想檢查我的電子信箱。

sentences.english: Yahoo Email is updating it's system.
sentences.chinese: 奇摩電子信箱近期持續更新系統功能。

sentences.english: Spam is unwanted sales messages sent to your electronic mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾你不想要的訊息發到你的電子信箱。

definition: Haicang district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
